title.narrative: 3.2.1 DETECTION, REFERENCE

description.narrative: By the end of 2015, the number of child victims detected and referred increases 20% through case detection & referral system's strengthening, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Justice For Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2015, children are better protected against exclusion, violence, abuse, and exploitation through a strengthened child protection system.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2015, the number of child victims detected and referred increases 20% through case detection & referral system'sstrengthening

description.narrative: The number of child victims detected and referred by child protection services is not yet increasing. The process of establishing an information management system on child protection is ongoing. UNICEF CDI advocated to integrate indicators on violence against children at school into the IMS of the Ministry of Education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/01/2017

title.narrative: Number of child victims of violence, abuse and exploitation detected and referred for care

actual.value: 2017:1129 new cases identified and referred for care in 2016

title.narrative: Number of operational child protection platforms

actual.value: 2017:In 2016 the decision was taken to focus on quality support to 10 platforms. Therefore 10 platforms are operational.

title.narrative: Number of districts covered by child protection services

actual.value: 2016:66 out of 90 districts covered by CP interventions

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Existence of routine administrative data collection systems and publications on violence, exploitation and abuse of children including violent deaths and injuries

actual.value: 2017:The process to establish a routine administrative data collection systems is ongoing. The consultant is recruited to conduct the process. As concern the violence against students, the data collection is integrated.
